Leo Hotel located in the heart of the historical centre of the old town of Rethymno, in Vafe street, next to the historical building of LOGGIA ,in the commercial street Arcadiou. Vafe street is a pedestrianized street, vertically located in Arcadiou street, near the Archaeological Department, in nr 214.
The visitors can enjoy themselves in the numerous cafes, restaurants, night clubs and shops found in the nearby area and at the same time admire the variety of the historical sites found near the hotel.
